sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using FalcoX services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions contained herein, you may not access or use our services. These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and FalcoX.

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: FalcoX provides decentralized exchange services, including but not limited to token swaps, liquidity provision, yield farming, and other DeFi-related services. The platform operates on blockchain technology and smart contracts. Users acknowledge that they are solely responsible for understanding the risks involved in using blockchain-based financial services.

sections.title: 3. User Responsibilities
sections.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their wallet credentials and for all activities that occur under their account. You agree to: (a) immediately notify FalcoX of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security, and (b) ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session when accessing the Service.

sections.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: All content present on FalcoX, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of FalcoX or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. The compilation of all content on FalcoX is the exclusive property of FalcoX and is protected by international copyright laws.

sections.title: 5. Trading and Financial Risk
sections.content: Cryptocurrency trading carries substantial risk. You acknowledge and agree that: (a) trading cryptocurrencies involves significant risk of loss, (b) your trades and investments are your own decisions, and (c) FalcoX is not responsible for any losses you may incur while using our services. We strongly recommend conducting thorough research before engaging in any trading activities.

sections.title: 6. Service Availability and Modifications
sections.content: FalcoX reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time, including the availability of any features, database, or content. We may also impose limits on certain features and services or restrict your access to parts or all of the Service without notice or liability.

sections.title: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
sections.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms of Service, explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our Service, you consent to our collection and use of personal data as outlined in the Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 8. Prohibited Activities
sections.content: Users agree not to engage in any of the following activities: (a) attempting to circumvent any security features, (b) using the service for any illegal purposes, (c) attempting to manipulate markets or prices, (d) using automated systems or software to extract data from the service (scraping), or (e) interfering with other users' access to the service.

sections.title: 9. Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. FalcoX makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

sections.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall FalcoX be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from: (a) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service, (b) any conduct or content of any third party on the service, or (c) unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content.

sections.title: 11. Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

sections.title: 12. Changes to Terms
sections.content: FalcoX reserves the right to revise these Terms at any time without notice. By using this Service, you are agreeing to be bound by the current version of these Terms of Service. Continued use of the Platform following the posting of changes will be deemed your acceptance of such changes.

sections.title: 13. Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@falcox.net. We will make every effort to respond to your inquiry promptly and address any concerns you may have regarding our Terms of Service.
